Evidence: These results indicate that (1) hypoxia reversibly inhibits Kv1.2 and Kv2.1 but not Kv1.5 homomeric channels, (2) Kv1.2 and 1.5 alpha subunits can assemble to form an O(2)-sensitive heteromeric channel, and (3) only Kv1.2/Kv1.5 and Kv2.1/Kv9.3 heteromeric channels are inhibited by hypoxia in the voltage range of the PA VSMC E(M).
